objective: Strengthen multi-modal UX quality, accessibility, and rendering performance coverage.
checkpoints: Checkpoint 1: Define scope and baseline metrics for this milestone.
Checkpoint 2: Implement highest-priority roadmap items with tests.
Checkpoint 3: Record completion evidence and rerun docs audit.
exit_criteria: All selected milestone items are implemented or intentionally deferred with rationale.
Automated tests pass on current branch.
Docs audit report regenerated with updated milestone status evidence.

selected_items.text: Define clear integration architecture, specify performance benchmarking methodology, scope formal verification to critical components only
Define quantitative success metrics, add community adoption plan, clarify data ownership and sharing policies
Position custom UI framework as research contribution, define UX metrics for custom OS platforms, connect to HCI research community
Specify performance benchmarking framework that applies consistently across all modules
Create systematic integration debugging methodology, design simplified demonstration setup, provide platform presentation guidelines
Design scalable repository architecture, specify comprehensive CI/CD for all platform components, add integration failure recovery procedures
Benchmark monorepo
Define clear research contributions, create evaluation metrics for OS/AR/VR performance, position work within existing research landscape
Define learning metrics in grants
Define quantitative platform evaluation metrics, identify comparable research platforms for benchmarking, create research publication and dissemination plan
Define XR KPIs
Develop templates in docs/_templates/performance-script.md for structuring streaming sessions as ritualized scholarship
Ensure AR/VR prototypes are platform‑agnostic, with performance benchmarks and hardware notes
Include quantified KPIs in all proposal narratives
Position observability system as research contribution, define performance benchmarks, connect to systems performance research community
add a systems diagram illustrating interdisciplinary tie-ins
Define serialization standards in templates for artifact integration
Design integration architecture that anticipates AR/VR real-time requirements from Module 4 onward
Expand Git topics to cover branching strategies, CI/CD pipelines, and handling large binary assets. Include Git LFS and multi‑platform toolchains
Expand grants section with societal impact narratives
